Topstartup

Don't panic.

Or, do panic. That's the point of this article. Are you more afraid of Aids or Staph infections. Why not be afraid of both? You're more likely to die of a crazy strain of staphylococcus. My roommate was telling me that it is resistant to antibiotics and if you get it, you are likely to die.

Im sitting at home for the rest of the year with my aluminum foil helmet on. How will you deal?

For more morbid thoughts (halloween is coming up), you can check when you are going to die. My date is Monday, March 28, 2072.
